channel.title: [Class Idea] Dancer
channel.description:
**The Dancer**
**Faction:** *Neutral*
**Class Type:** *Special*
**Passives:**
**Egocentric** : Immune to death at night once. This is lost when you achieve your objective.
**Day abilities:**
**Get Ready** (2 uses): Make sure that you visit your target tonight. If you get Jailed, you will dance for the Prince. **Love letter** (2 uses): Discover a player's class type at the start of the next day.
**Night abilities** :
**Dance!** (infinite uses): Dance for a player and weaken them tonight based on their class type. Investigative- Always gets wrong results. / (Stacks with Frame) _Killer_- Their attacks will do nothing. / (Like attacking a Reaper.) _Offensive_- Lose their passives. / (During that night.) _Support_- Visits will be prevented. / (Prevented.) _Social_- Day abilities disabled tomorrow. / _Special_- Nothing. /
Win Condition: Dance for 4 diferent class types.

item.title: [Class Idea] Dancer
item.dc:creator: Mercenary
item.description:
It is not Scorned because Scorned manipulated social aspects of the game. It is straightly offensive with the exception of Seeker’s day gaze.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Idea] Dancer
item.dc:creator: Anglasut
item.description:
As I said, you wouldnt want to target a killer twice, and after winning, he cant use his skills anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Idea] Dancer
item.dc:creator: Anglasut
item.description:
Any suggestions? Could make it give 2 types (like Flirt) so its not that straight forward.
I like special because he is a mix of Sellsword and Scorned, like Alchemist.
I think LL has the same problem that Stalk had with Scorned, but since its delayed feedback, Its not that op imo.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Idea] Dancer
item.dc:creator: Mercenary
item.description:
Honestly I don’t see why this is Special, would fit into Offensive better.
I find LL not only to be quite OP (principally considering its wincon), but it could be replaced with something better. Something that would encourage a smarter use of the class instead of having it win freely.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Idea] Dancer
item.dc:creator: Luxy
item.description:
It’s a surprisingly not one faction sided neut

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Idea] Dancer
item.dc:creator: Luxy
item.description:
Just make it so it only does this to bd killers

item.description:
Np

item.title: [Class Idea] Dancer

item.description:
Really good idea, thanks!

item.title: [Class Idea] Dancer
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
Anglasut:

Support - Their heals will do nothing. / (Will recieve a “Could not heal X”.)
Social - Wont be able to visit their target. / (Prevented.)

I think it’s just better for support to be prevented and social to have day abilities disabled tomorrow

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Idea] Dancer
item.dc:creator: Planterror
item.description:
Anglasut:

Support - Their heals will do nothing. / (Will recieve a “Could not heal X”.)

Court wizard empower. Court wizard swap. Ritualist Brotherhood. Sage Wall of fire. Herbalife Defile. Herbalist Drug. All of these are not heals and thus the majority of support abilities are fine.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Idea] Dancer
item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
I’m not sure how this sits with me.

I’ll have something written down later.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Idea] Dancer
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Not all neuts do that, I think you need to write it down

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Idea] Dancer
item.dc:creator: Anglasut
item.description:
Like all other neuts, once you win, you skills are disabled, or do I have to write that down?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Idea] Dancer
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
You can win by D5, then help BD

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Idea] Dancer
item.dc:creator: Anglasut
item.description:
Why would you go for a Killer class more than once? It goes agains your win condition.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Idea] Dancer
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Except 9/10 he won’t be prevented and this class will destroy evils. There’s zero way to kill it and since it can help find evils BD won’t lynch it.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Idea] Dancer
item.dc:creator: Anglasut
item.description:
He can be prevented + killed

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Idea] Dancer
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Probably needs 1 time death immunity.

This class is extremely annoying to killers and there’s like zero way to kill it

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Idea] Dancer
item.dc:creator: Anglasut
item.description:
Oh my bad, fixing it.

item.title: [Class Idea] Dancer
item.dc:creator: Anglasut
item.description:
The Dancer

Faction: Neutral

Class Type: Special

Passives:

Egocentric : Immune to death at night once. This is lost when you achieve your objective.

Day abilities:

Get Ready (2 uses): Make sure that you visit your target tonight. If you get Jailed, you will dance for the Prince.
Love letter (2 uses): Discover a player’s class type at the start of the next day.

Night abilities :

Dance! (infinite uses): Dance for a player and weaken them tonight based on their class type.
Investigative- Always gets wrong results. / (Stacks with Frame)
Killer- Their attacks will do nothing. / (Like attacking a Reaper.)
Offensive- Lose their passives. / (During that night.)
Support- Visits will be prevented. / (Prevented.)
Social- Day abilities disabled tomorrow. /
Special- Nothing. /

Win Condition: Dance for 4 diferent class types.
